title: r/Choosingbeggars JOB OPENING: Requires PhD, NO PAY!
description: r/Choosingbeggars Is this the single worst job opening in this history of the world? Imagine dedicating your entire life to earning a PhD, and then when you get out of school someone tries to get you to work at a $0/hour job. But don't worry! Once you invent a billion dollar patent that makes your employer rich, THEN they'll start paying you.
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
